title: (x) Typophile logo & background of homepage - H&FJ Gotham, Featured Face {Jan E}
content:
Hi, I'm a graphic design student and was wondering what the typeface for the Typophile logo is. As well as the typeface in the background of the main page.

Any help is appreciated.  
-Adam
author: AdamJones87

comments.content:
Typophile logo/website font is [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013174204/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100008) from H&FJ.  
As for the typeface in the background - see Featured Face at the right.
